name: Russian Village Simulator
description:
Russian Village Simulator is a game that allows the player to immerse himself in the atmosphere of real Russian village life. The game presents various activities that are typical for life in the village.



In the game you can engage in a vegetable garden, grow various fruits and vegetables, take care of animals, collect crops and canning them in jars. You can also catch fish in the river, hunt wild animals, collect berries and mushrooms in the forest.



The village has its own sauna, where you can wash and rest after hard work.
You can also do crafts and create various wood products.



An important aspect of the game is to communicate with other villagers. The player can help them in difficult situations, exchange resources and participate in the social life of the village.

The game also has elements of economic strategy. The player can sell his goods, develop his farm and improve his home.

Russian Village Simulator is a game that allows the player to immerse himself in the atmosphere of real Russian village life and enjoy its simplicity and beauty.
